sentences.en: Imperialism has not been able to subjugate China.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义不能征服中国.

sentences.en: It'shows mankind's subjectivist wish to subjugate robots to his mastery.
sentences.cn: 它表明了人类想主宰机器人的主观愿望.

sentences.en: The native population was subjugated and exploited.
sentences.cn: 土著人被征服，并遭受剥削。

sentences.en: Their costly and futile attempt to subjugate the Afghans lasted just 10 years.
sentences.cn: 他们大动干戈想要控制阿富汗地区，但只持续了10年就无果而终了。

sentences.en: You'd better manage to subjugate him. Otherwise it will be all over with you.
sentences.cn: 你得设法让他俯首帖耳, 否则的话你就完了.

words.tran_cn: 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的
主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民

trans.tran_en: to defeat a person or group and make them obey you
to defeat a person or group and make them obey you
